Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I am a daughter of a multiple myeloma patient that is why I am on cancercompass. However, a mother of a friend has been just diagnosed with breast cancer. her tumor is 12mm. That is all I know - is that a lot or not so much? More importantly, she lives in New Jersey and is looking asap for a clinic or a doctor in New York or near. Any advices? are there special centers that specializa in breast cancer? please please help...
Posts.Title: doctor/clinic in New York
